entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
